title: Mission Wealth Named No. 3429 on the 2025 Inc. 5000 List of America's Fastest-Growing Private Companies
description: Mission Wealth Named No. 3429 on the 2025 Inc. 5000 List of America's Fastest-Growing Private Companies
content:
Nationally recognized wealth management firm ranks No. 3429 in 2025, continuing a decade-long track record of growth and excellence.

SANTA BARBARA, Calif., Aug. 12, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Inc ., the leading media brand for entrepreneurs and business leaders, today announced that Mission Wealth has ranked No. 3429 on its annual Inc. 5000 list , a prestigious ranking of the fastest-growing private companies in America. This marks Mission Wealth's ninth appearance on the list, underscoring the firm's sustained growth, client-first approach, and dedication to innovation in wealth management.

The Inc . 5000 list offers a data-driven snapshot of the most successful companies in the economy's most dynamic segment—independent, entrepreneurial businesses. The nationally accredited registered investment advisory firm's 3-year growth rate topped 114%.

"Being recognized on the Inc . 5000 for the ninth time is a testament to the dedication of our team and the trust our clients place in us," said Matthew Adams , CEO and Managing Partner of the nationally recognized Mission Wealth. "Our growth has been fueled by a clear vision: to empower clients to achieve true wealth by aligning their financial strategies with their life goals. We're proud to have navigated changing markets while maintaining our unwavering commitment to personalized service and impactful advice."

This year's honorees demonstrated exceptional growth while navigating economic uncertainty, inflationary pressures, and a shifting labor market. Mission Wealth's consistent presence on the list reflects its ability to adapt, innovate, and deliver value to its growing client base nationwide.
• Inc. 5000: No. 3860 (2024), No. 3746 (2023), No. 3858 (2022), No. 4260 (2021), No. 4450 (2018), No. 3607 (2017), No. 3094 (2016), No. 2907 (2015)
• Inc. Best in Busines s : 2022 (Financial Services)

Please view all Mission Wealth awards and honors here .

For the complete list, company profiles, and a searchable database by industry and location, visit: www.inc.com/inc5000 .

"Making the Inc . 5000 is always a remarkable achievement, but earning a spot this year speaks volumes about a company's tenacity and clarity of vision," says Mike Hofman, editor-in-chief of Inc . "These businesses have thrived amid rising costs, shifting global dynamics, and constant change. They didn't just weather the storm—they grew through it, and their stories are a powerful reminder that the entrepreneurial spirit is the engine of the U.S. economy."

About Inc. and Methodology

Inc . is the leading media brand and playbook for entrepreneurs and business leaders shaping our future. Companies on the 2025 Inc . 5000 are ranked according to percentage revenue growth from 2021 to 2024. To qualify, companies must have been founded and generating revenue by March 31, 2021. They must be U.S.-based, privately held, for-profit, and independent—not subsidiaries or divisions of other companies—as of December 31, 2024. (Since then, some on the list may have gone public or been acquired.) The minimum revenue required for 2021 is $100,000; the minimum for 2024 is $2 million. An administrative fee of $295 was paid to apply. As always, Inc. reserves the right to decline applicants for subjective reasons. For more information, visit www.inc.com .

About Mission Wealth

Since 2000, Mission Wealth has been a nationally recognized Registered Investment Advisor (RIA) dedicated to serving over 4,225 valued clients and families and managing assets exceeding $12.2 billion across the United States. For comprehensive information about Mission Wealth's core values and services, please visit www.missionwealth.com or contact us at 805-516-5187 for a complimentary financial planning consultation.

This marks Mission Wealth's ninth appearance on the list, highlighting its consistent growth and dedication to innovation in wealth management. The company's 3-year growth rate topped 114%.

scraped_sources.text:
Nationally recognized wealth management firm ranks No. 3429 in 2025, continuing a decade-long track record of growth and excellence.
SANTA BARBARA, Calif., Aug. 12, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Inc ., the leading media brand for entrepreneurs and business leaders, today announced that Mission Wealth has ranked No. 3429 on its annual Inc. 5000 list , a prestigious ranking of the fastest-growing private companies in America. This marks Mission Wealth's ninth appearance on the list, underscoring the firm's sustained growth, client-first approach, and dedication to innovation in wealth management.
The Inc . 5000 list offers a data-driven snapshot of the most successful companies in the economy's most dynamic segment—independent, entrepreneurial businesses. The nationally accredited registered investment advisory firm's 3-year growth rate topped 114%.
"Being recognized on the Inc . 5000 for the ninth time is a testament to the dedication of our team and the trust our clients place in us," said Matthew Adams , CEO and Managing Partner of the nationally recognized Mission Wealth. "Our growth has been fueled by a clear vision: to empower clients to achieve true wealth by aligning their financial strategies with their life goals. We're proud to have navigated changing markets while maintaining our unwavering commitment to personalized service and impactful advice."
This year's honorees demonstrated exceptional growth while navigating economic uncertainty, inflationary pressures, and a shifting labor market. Mission Wealth's consistent presence on the list reflects its ability to adapt, innovate, and deliver value to its growing client base nationwide.
Mission Wealth's Previous Inc. Honors
- Inc. 5000: No. 3860 (2024), No. 3746 (2023), No. 3858 (2022), No. 4260 (2021), No. 4450 (2018), No. 3607 (2017), No. 3094 (2016), No. 2907 (2015)
- Inc. Best Workplaces: 2025, 2024, 2023, 2022, 2021, 2020, 2018
- Inc. Best in Busines s : 2022 (Financial Services)
- Inc. Regionals Pacific: No. 151 (2023)
Please view all Mission Wealth awards and honors here .
For the complete list, company profiles, and a searchable database by industry and location, visit: www.inc.com/inc5000 .
"Making the Inc . 5000 is always a remarkable achievement, but earning a spot this year speaks volumes about a company's tenacity and clarity of vision," says Mike Hofman, editor-in-chief of Inc . "These businesses have thrived amid rising costs, shifting global dynamics, and constant change. They didn't just weather the storm—they grew through it, and their stories are a powerful reminder that the entrepreneurial spirit is the engine of the U.S. economy."
About Inc. and Methodology
Inc . is the leading media brand and playbook for entrepreneurs and business leaders shaping our future. Companies on the 2025 Inc . 5000 are ranked according to percentage revenue growth from 2021 to 2024. To qualify, companies must have been founded and generating revenue by March 31, 2021. They must be U.S.-based, privately held, for-profit, and independent—not subsidiaries or divisions of other companies—as of December 31, 2024. (Since then, some on the list may have gone public or been acquired.) The minimum revenue required for 2021 is $100,000; the minimum for 2024 is $2 million. An administrative fee of $295 was paid to apply. As always, Inc. reserves the right to decline applicants for subjective reasons. For more information, visit www.inc.com .
About Mission Wealth
Since 2000, Mission Wealth has been a nationally recognized Registered Investment Advisor (RIA) dedicated to serving over 4,225 valued clients and families and managing assets exceeding $12.2 billion across the United States. For comprehensive information about Mission Wealth's core values and services, please visit www.missionwealth.com or contact us at 805-516-5187 for a complimentary financial planning consultation.
Follow Mission Wealth's Growth: LinkedIn | Instagram | YouTube
MISSION WEALTH IS A REGISTERED INVESTMENT ADVISOR. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. 00780022 08/25
SOURCE Mission Wealth Management, LP

Innan du fortsätter till YouTube
Vi använder cookies och data för att
- leverera och underhålla Googles tjänster
- spåra avbrott och skydda mot spam, bedrägeri och otillåten användning
- mäta målgruppsengagemang och webbplatsstatistik så att vi kan analysera hur våra tjänster används och förbättra tjänsternas kvalitet.
Om du väljer knappen Godkänn alla använder vi även cookies och data för att
- utveckla och förbättra nya tjänster
- leverera annonser och mäta hur effektiva de är
- visa anpassat innehåll utifrån dina inställningar
- visa anpassade annonser utifrån dina inställningar
Om du väljer knappen Avvisa alla använder vi inte cookies i dessa ytterligare syften.
Innehåll och annonser utan anpassning påverkas bland annat av vad du tittar på för tillfället och din plats (annonser visas utifrån din ungefärliga plats). Innehåll och annonser med anpassning kan även omfatta sådant som videorekommendationer, en anpassad YouTube Hem-sida och anpassade annonser utifrån tidigare aktivitet, till exempel vad du tittar på och söker efter på YouTube. Vi använder även cookies och data för att anpassa upplevelsen efter lämplighet för din målgrupp, om tillämpligt.
Välj knappen Fler alternativ för mer information, till exempel om hur du hanterar dina integritetsinställningar. Du kan även besöka g.co/privacytools när som helst.

🎉 9 Years Among America’s Fastest-Growing Companies We are beyond excited to share that Mission Wealth has ranked No. 3429 on the 2025 Inc. Magazine 5000 list, achieving award-winning growth for 9 consecutive years! This milestone reflects our passion for helping clients achieve their goals and our commitment to innovation in wealth management. Each chapter of our journey has been shaped by client trust and the exceptional work of our team members. Together, we’ve built a culture of collaboration, innovation, and service that continues to drive our success year after year. 🌟 Celebrating 9 years of national growth recognition reminds us that growth is about more than numbers — it’s about making a meaningful impact in the lives we serve. Explore the complete list online: http://www.inc.com/inc5000 Read our full announcement here: https://lnkd.in/gFh7qtm8 #Inc5000 #MissionWealth
Mission Wealth
Financial Services
Santa Barbara, California 3,693 followers
Your goals. Our mission. Celebrating 25 Years of Service.
About us
Mission Wealth is a premier wealth and investment management firm headquartered in Santa Barbara, CA, with multiple offices across the United States. Mission Wealth’s service offerings include financial planning, investment management, estate planning, asset protection, charitable giving, tax planning, retirement planning, and Inspired Living. Since 2000, Mission Wealth has offered holistic wealth management services to high-net-worth families throughout the United States. We specialize in helping people during major life events, and our visionary, service-oriented culture is focused on empowering our clients to lead more fulfilled lives.

"One of my mentors told me to find something you want to do for the rest of your life, and you'll never have to retire. So, I pivoted, and I love being an advisor." Daniele Beasley, CFP®, MBA's work is rooted in helping women move beyond hesitation and toward clarity so they can take control of their finances with confidence and purpose. Whether you're facing a life transition or want to feel more in command of your financial future, confidence is key, and it starts with understanding your strengths. 📘 Explore our free guide to discover how to align your instincts with smart investment strategies: https://lnkd.in/gNMsxHjS 🎥 Watch Daniele’s full story here: https://lnkd.in/g8e3jaH5

📈Market swings happen, but the real risk? Letting short-term swings derail your long-term plan. The smartest investors know that discipline, not emotion, drives long-term success. 🎯 What you’ll learn: - Why we tend to fear losses more than celebrate gains - How recent market calm can distort your risk expectations - Why alarming headlines can lead to poor timing decisions - Practical strategies to keep your emotions in check and stay on track In our latest blog, we explore how to keep perspective during market volatility, the strategies to keep your portfolio on course, and why disciplined investing often wins over reactive decisions. 🔗Read the full article by Wealth Advisor Scott Ranby, CFP®, CEPA®,CPA, MBA here: https://lnkd.in/dbfGHeYi 🎥 Watch the video: https://lnkd.in/dBdzcASp

Discover how your natural strengths can shape a more confident investing journey. 🚀 We’re hiring a Chief Financial Officer! Mission Wealth — a Barron’s Top 100 RIA and voted one of the Best Places to Work (Fortune, Pacific Coast Business Times, Inc., and Investment News) — is looking for a growth-minded CFO to join our award-winning team. If you’re a finance leader with hustle, strategic vision, and a passion for purpose, here’s your chance to elevate your career at a nationally expanding wealth management firm committed to giving back. As CFO, you’ll oversee the financial health of the company, lead budgeting, reporting, compliance, and operations, and mentor a high-performing team—all while shaping strategy alongside senior leadership. Ready to lead with ambition and make an impact? Let’s go! ➡️ Apply now: https://lnkd.in/gGc93r2u #MissionWealth #NowHiring #ChiefFinancialOfficer #CFOJobs #BestPlacestoWork

Your home isn’t just where you live—it’s where your life unfolds. 🏠 Whether you're buying your first home, upsizing for family, or considering a move in retirement, your decisions are shaped by more than market trends—they're shaped by your mindset. In our recent blog, we explored how behavioral finance uncovers the emotional aspects of real estate decisions and how understanding them can lead to better outcomes. 🔍 Inside, you’ll explore: - How your stage of life affects the way you approach homeownership - The psychology behind indecision, overconfidence, and “forever home” thinking - Tips to align your financial strategy with the life you’re building 📖 Read the full article by Byron E. Valles, MSFP, CFP®: https://lnkd.in/g2jvfiWy

📍 We’re hiring a Wealth Advisor in Santa Barbara! Mission Wealth is looking for a driven, relationship-focused advisor with a CFP® or CFA designation to join our award-winning team on the Central Coast. This is a unique opportunity to work with a nationally recognized firm, deliver meaningful financial guidance to high-net-worth clients, and grow your career in a region known for its beauty and community. This role is ideal for someone who thrives on building deep client relationships, delivering personalized financial planning, and growing alongside a supportive team. As a Wealth Advisor, you'll collaborate closely with your Lead Advisor and team to deliver personalized planning and proactive service. With your attention to detail and talent for translating complex financial topics, you’ll help clients feel confident in their decisions while advancing your own professional journey. As a Barron’s Top 100 RIA and one of the Best Places to Work (Fortune, Pacific Coast Business Times, Inc., and Investment News), we offer a collaborative culture, local leadership, and a mission-driven approach to wealth management. 🌟 Ready to make an impact in your clients’ lives and your own? ➡️ Apply now: https://lnkd.in/g_PXnAp6 #MissionWealth #SantaBarbaraJobs #WealthAdvisor #FinancialPlanningCareers #CFPCareers #CFAJobs #NowHiring #BestPlacesToWork

Inheriting an IRA comes with unique opportunities and important rules. Whether you're a spouse, child, or other beneficiary, understanding your withdrawal options can help you avoid mistakes and make the most of your inheritance. In our latest blog post, we break down the latest changes and requirements, along with tips for creating a tax-efficient plan. 💡 Here's what you'll learn: - How the 10-year rule and life-expectancy method apply to different beneficiaries - What the 2025 IRS rule update means for inherited IRA distributions - Planning tips to reduce taxes and align withdrawals with your long-term goals 🔗 Read the full article by Mia Cattaneo, CFP®, MBA: https://lnkd.in/gr52SuK2
-
Please join us in celebrating the retirement of Allyn Hughes! Allyn joined Mission Wealth in 2023 as part of the BHJ Wealth Advisors merger and dutifully served as our Director of Risk Management. Although we knew his tenure was going to be short, Allyn’s accomplishments within our Wealth Strategy team and client services will be felt for years to come. Today, we honor Allyn’s career, and we’re grateful for the guidance, dedication, and vision that defined his time with us. Allyn, we wish you all the best in this next chapter! 💙

argos_summary: Mission Wealth has been ranked No. 3429 on the 2025 Inc. 5000 list, marking its ninth consecutive appearance on this prestigious list of the fastest-growing private companies in America. The firm achieved a remarkable 3-year growth rate of over 114%, reflecting its commitment to client service and innovative wealth management strategies. CEO Matthew Adams attributes this success to the dedication of the team and the trust of their clients, emphasizing their focus on aligning financial strategies with clients' life goals.
